Text: A Finnish Spitz (Finnish language: "Suomenpystykorva") is a breed of dog originating in Finland.

Text: Finnish Spitz:  The breed is friendly and in general loves children, so it is suitable for domestic life.

Text: Finnish Spitz:  The Finnish Spitz has been the national dog of Finland since 1979.
